about_the_game:
About the Game

An ancient emperor accidentally obtained 《The Immortal Scripture》 and embarked on a journey of battles to unlock its secrets, heading towards the path of immortality...

Unique Gameplay

In 《The Immortal Scripture》 players can freely choose which side to battle. What if you choose the left side and lose to the AI-controlled right side? Then just switch to the right side and fight against the AI-controlled left side.

Ridiculously Strong AI

The AI in 《The Immortal Scripture》 uses the latest reinforcement learning algorithms. After long periods of training and fine-tuning, it ensures that every level is a challenge that even the author can easily lose to. The goal is to provide players with a refreshing and engaging gaming experience.

Beyond Balance

Each level in《The Immortal Scripture》 has undergone repeated calculations to ensure the overall strength is evenly matched on both sides. Additionally, it ensures that each character's card abilities are neither overly strong nor overly weak.

The Author is a Good Person

To help players clear the game, at the very beginning, the author offers a sacrifice feature. By sacrificing your subjects, you can directly alter the stats of the characters on the board, making it easier to clear the level. Hopefully, this will help you progress!
